name: Into The Abyss
description: "Into the Abyss" is my first attempt with lighting and is also an intro for a new episode I will work on. I put far more detail and work into it than I did with "Dead Zone," and retained some simplicity. I tired to create the classic doom experience, once again. Have fun. I will add multilayer start locations/guns, difficulty settings, and more secrets on a later date.
